message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1025000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose a price of $975000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that respects the value of the item while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $975000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer the product to you for $1012500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to both of us.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Let me propose a price of $987500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the item while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $987500. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer the product to you for $1007500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose a price of $992500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the item while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $992500. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $1002500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to both of us.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Let me propose a final price of $997500 for the product. This is my best offer, and I hope it meets your expectations for a fair compromise.
